thread.title: The Untold Truths of Game of Thrones
thread.title_full: The Untold Truths of Game of Thrones

author: Justin Page
title: The Untold Truths of Game of Thrones
text:
Looper has released a video where they unearth some of the untold truths about HBO ‘s hit television series, Game of Thrones . They reveal that the show was nearly canceled before airing, that Language Creation Society founder David J. Peterson actually created entire languages for both Dothraki and Valyrian , and that the brutal “ Red Wedding ” scene was based on a real Scottish incident that took place in 1440.
Related Laughing Squid Posts Untold Truths About the Friday the 13th Horror Film Franchise A 1971 Episode of the Game Show ‘To Tell the Truth’ in Which Contestants Try to Identify Comics Legend Stan Lee A Series of Illustrations Featuring the Meaning of Television Show Names in Other Languages
